website_summaries.verdict: A versatile hybrid machine that can revive even the dullest blade. Options for Asian, European and American knife angles.
pros: Options for both manual and electric sharpening
Includes slots for Asian, European/American angled blades
cons: The motor could be more powerful and may run slightly hot

customer_reviews.title: Sharpner
customer_reviews.text: May just be me, but it doesn't seem to sharpen that well and on a long or crooked blade it seems awkward to pull it trough right. I don't think I'd purchase one again
customer_reviews.author: Denny Stamps

customer_reviews.title: 2 uses and it broke!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used it twice and it broke. It sharpened great while it was working. The wheel inside made a weird noise and now it won't turn back on.
customer_reviews.author: QuelFace

customer_reviews.title: Great knife sharpener
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, I didn't get much of a result using stones so I bought this sharpener. I was hoping it would get them a little sharper but its better than what I got from the stones. I would recommend this unit
customer_reviews.author: Ted W Simerson

customer_reviews.title: Great little sharpener.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Precision sharpens even the dullest knives . Don't have to go to my grinder on my workbench anymore. Easily done right on the kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: So easy to keep our knives sharp.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried "steels", stones and non-electric sharpeners. The Chef'sChoice sharpens much faster and much better. I sharpen my knives every four or five weeks. Could go longer but I love the functionality of a really sharp knife. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Doug Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband and he lives it. A great product
customer_reviews.author: LadyBozarth

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: could use better guards but definitely does what it says and its great at it loo
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Trifoni

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as robust as I thought it would be. Does a good job sharpening with 7-10 passes, and will shave the hair off my arm (my sharpness test).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Sharp knives in the kitchen after years of neglect and just in time for Thanksgiving dinner
customer_reviews.author: SDJim

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my knives SHARP
customer_reviews.text: Does a fine job of keeping my kitchen knives extremely sharp. I have been gifted with some fairly expensive knives over the last decade and keeping them REALLY sharp lets them be all that they can be. :-)
customer_reviews.author: ChocolateChipCookie330

customer_reviews.title: Not functional
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't use it as it is made for USA only... the electricity voltage is 110 where in everywhere in the world is 220...
customer_reviews.author: Mazen

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully
customer_reviews.text: I am very particular about keeping my knives sharp. They were a sizeable investment and this knife sharpener works well.
customer_reviews.author: Pen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Christmas Gifts!!! Works as well if not better than the more expensive versions.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Stopped work after first knife. I had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: Does not last as long as we thought it would
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good Household Sharpener
customer_reviews.text: Sharpened all my kitchen knives including the serrated knives, plus my pocket knives, plus two daggers and a Bowie knife to near razor sharpness in a short amount of time. The honing part of the sharpener did a good job, but lacked a positive feel during the process. Overall, a great sharpener for around the house. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jim M.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: My knives are super sharp after using it. 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: No mashed tomatoes
customer_reviews.text: No more problems cutting tomatoes or anything else. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Brad M

customer_reviews.title: I love mine and I hope they enjoy them as well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and the sharpening steels for my children for Christmas presents. I love mine and I hope they enjoy them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila E Stringfellow

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: This works exceptionally well and sharpened if our most dull knife. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: gloryb32

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It seems to do a good job in putting a sharp edge on my knives but it does scratch them so it is not something to use if you are trying to maintain the shine to your knife blades. Does what it claims to do however so I would recommend this to anyone who is looking for a sharpener that actually does sharpen knives.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the ease of operation. Did a fantastic job on my knives.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: I can get a better blade with a professional stone
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay product. However, I can get a better blade with a professional stone.
customer_reviews.author: william joseph mcgrath

customer_reviews.title: Chef's choice 290 hybrid Didn't work !!
customer_reviews.text: I received the item which I bought it but it doesn't work at all , what is wrong I don't know????
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My poor Henckle knives had been neglected for so long that ...
customer_reviews.text: My poor Henckle knives had been neglected for so long that they were pretty much useless. I finally broke down and bought a nice(ish) electric sharpener to make the task easy. Wow! It took a few extra passes, but the knives are like new and amazingly sharp! I even polished up some other serrated blades that had burrs keeping them from working well. They are like new now. Amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: DatCrazyMongoose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cannot believe how well this sharpens knives. Much easier and more effective than others I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Astute Shopper

customer_reviews.title: This is a great knife sharpener!
customer_reviews.text: This sharpener would have been 5 stars if it had the better blade guides! It works just fine otherwise... Hold your blade tight against the guide and draw back slowly and evenly. It would be nice to have a bright work light on a gooseneck to shine down over the work area!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Arena

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this. I was taking my knives to a place that sharpens them and it was a pain to get there. This sharpens like a pro. I like the polishing aspect too.
customer_reviews.author: Kep

customer_reviews.title: Very good unit
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Sharpened cheap knives and did an awesome job on the better knives. I thought I wouldnt mind the manual hone but I do. I think next time I will get more stages. Don't let my poor decision mislead you. THIS is an awesome unit. I can cut carboard easily with my knives as well as get through a tomato skin and make clean thin slices. This unit does work and does it nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D

customer_reviews.title: Great item works great
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a difference in the sharpness of our kitchen knives just in time for Thanksgiving it’s certainly going to make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Marlen F.

customer_reviews.title: Follow directions for best results.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Rejuvenated chipped and dull blades to better than new. I forgot what it was like to cut and chop with sharp knives.
customer_reviews.author: Becky’s Party

customer_reviews.title: Good investment for your expensive knives!
customer_reviews.text: Have looked a long time for a good sharpener. This works great. Does all of my knives. Like it.
customer_reviews.author: John F.

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds Expectation
customer_reviews.text: Knives that would never sharpen properly before will cut paper now! Super sturdy reliable product. We are so pleased with it's performance.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Say goodbye to using a sharpening steel each time you need to cut some meat
customer_reviews.text: Great knife sharpener, really brought new life back to my ten year old knives. I have used it with both 15 and 20 degree knives and it does the job well!
customer_reviews.author: Erich

customer_reviews.title: Does EVERTHING I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Fast and EASY sharpening - create 15 degree blade out of older 20 degree in just a few minutes and keep those Asian knifes like new.
customer_reviews.author: Mikee fauldini

customer_reviews.title: it's terrific, the best
customer_reviews.text: My parents own one, it's terrific, the best. I do the cooking in my house as the father.. I would recommend it to any cook/chef or house food preparer. CRC
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne j clark

customer_reviews.title: An extremely good addition to my kitchen & worth every penny !
customer_reviews.text: Awesome piece of equipment ! Fast, easy to operate & love the dual angle. The 15 degree part is ideal for slicers & filet knives. Even does a good job on bread knives. Plan on buying a couple more as presents for special people,
customer_reviews.author: Hot Rod

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I ONLY USE THE 20 DEGREE SIDE IT MAKES THE KNIFES RAZOR SHARP
customer_reviews.author: DAVID D.

customer_reviews.title: So-So
customer_reviews.text: This I purchased to replace my grandmother's 50 year old sharpener as it began to scallop blades. Here's the "good", no more scalloping: the "bad", granny's sharpener was around 3 decades old when I began using it. This new machine does not sharpen any better, New. It does, however, have more features...for better or worse.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia K.

product_meta.title: Chef’sChoice 290 AngleSelect Hybrid Diamond Hone Knife Sharpener Combines Electric and Manual Sharpening for Straight and Serrated Knives with Patented Finishing Stage Made in USA, 3-Stage, Black
product_meta.description: The new, Chef's Choice Hybrid Angle Select Diamond Hone 290 knife sharpener provides Edge Craft's most advanced Hybrid technology for the ultimate razor sharp edges on all your 15 Degree and 20 Degree class knives. Combining electric and manual sharpening stages, it is ideal for sharpening traditional European/American 20 Degree class household knives and Asian Style and other 15 Degree class knives. From straight edge and serrated blades to light sports knives and pocket knives, this affordable sharpener uses angle guides and 100% diamond abrasives in all three stages to apply an extremely sharp, arch-shaped edge that is stronger and more durable. Using the advanced, efficient Criss-Cross sharpening technology, the Hybrid 290 provides a superbly sharp edge with lots of "bite." Its 100% diamond abrasive wheels sharpen simultaneously "into" and "out-of" the edge for a superior burr-free edge. Stages 1 and 2 are electric with Stage 1 dedicated to 15 Degree edge knives and Stage 2 for 20 Degree knives. Stage 3 is used for polishing both types of knives as well as for sharpening serrated knives. Safe for all quality knives, the Hybrid 290 is easy to use, requires no guesswork and will quickly sharpen even the dullest of knives. It's a stylish addition to any household with its elegant and durable brushed stainless steel cover and sleek design. Engineered and manufactured in the U.S.A.
feature_bullets: ALL STYLES OF KNIVES: Hybrid AngleSelect technology for razor sharp edges on all your knives, including European/American 20-degree knives, Asian style 15-degree knives, straight and serrated blades, and sport and pocket knives
HYBRID SHARPENER: Combining electric and manual sharpening stages for an extremely sharp, arch-shaped edge that is stronger and more durable
ADVANCED SHARPENING: Efficient CrissCross sharpening technology and diamond abrasive wheels sharpen simultaneously to create a highly effective, extremely sharp, burr-free, durable edge
DIAMONDS: 100 percent diamond abrasives in Stages 1, 2 and 3 and ultra-fine diamond abrasives in Stage 3 ensure a super sharp, polished edge
PRECISION: Angle guides for precise sharpening
EASY TO USE: The Hybrid sharpener requires no guesswork and will quickly sharpen even the dullest of knives
STAINLESS STEEL: Elegant and durable brushed stainless steel cover
Engineered and assembled in the USA
